verses.verse: What <S%G5101><s%> Then <S%G3767><s%> Shall We Say? <S%G2046><s%> Shall We Continue <S%G1961><s%> In <S%G3588><s%> Sin <S%G266><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Grace <S%G5485><s%> May Abound? <S%G4121><s%>

May <S%G3361><s%> It Not Be! <S%G1096><s%> We <S%G3748><s%> Who Died <S%G599><s%> To <S%G3588><s%> Sin, <S%G266><s%> How <S%G4459><s%> Still <S%G2089><s%> Shall We Live <S%G2198><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> It? <S%G846><s%>

Or <S%G2228><s%> Are Ye Ignorant <S%G50><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> As Many As <S%G3745><s%> We Were Baptized <S%G907><s%> Unto <S%G1519><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Unto <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> His <S%G2288><s%> Death <S%G846><s%> We Were Baptized? <S%G907><s%>

We Were Buried <S%G4916><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> With Him <S%G846><s%> By <S%G1223><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Baptism <S%G908><s%> Unto <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Death <S%G2288><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> As <S%G5618><s%> Was Raised Up <S%G1453><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> From Among The <S%G1537><s%> Dead <S%G3498><s%> By <S%G1223><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Glory <S%G1391><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Father, <S%G3962><s%> So <S%G3779><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> We <S%G2249><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Newness <S%G2538><s%> Of Life <S%G2222><s%> Should Walk. <S%G4043><s%>

If <S%G1487><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> Conjoined <S%G4854><s%> We Have Become <S%G1096><s%> In The <S%G3588><s%> Likeness <S%G3667><s%> Of <S%G3588><s%> Death, <S%G2288><s%> His <S%G846><s%> So <S%G235><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> Of His <S%G3588><s%> Resurrection <S%G386><s%> We Shall Be; <S%G2071><s%>

This <S%G5124><s%> Knowing, <S%G1097><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Old <S%G3820><s%> Our <S%G2257><s%> Man <S%G444><s%> Was Crucified With Him, <S%G4957><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> Might Be Annulled <S%G2673><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Body <S%G4983><s%> Of <S%G3588><s%> Sin, <S%G266><s%> That <S%G3588><s%> No Longer <S%G3371><s%> Be Subservient <S%G1398><s%> We <S%G2248><s%> To <S%G3588><s%> Sin. <S%G266><s%>
He That <S%G3588><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> Died <S%G599><s%> Has Been Justified <S%G1344><s%> From <S%G575><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Sin. <S%G266><s%>

If <S%G1487><s%> Now <S%G1161><s%> We Died <S%G599><s%> With <S%G4862><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> We Believe <S%G4100><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> We Shall Live With <S%G4800><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%>

Knowing <S%G1492><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Having Been Raised Up <S%G1453><s%> From Among The <S%G1537><s%> Dead, <S%G3498><s%> No More <S%G3765><s%> Dies : <S%G599><s%> Death <S%G2288><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> No More <S%G3765><s%> Rules Over. <S%G2961><s%>

In That <S%G3739><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> He Died <S%G599><s%> To <S%G3588><s%> Sin <S%G266><s%> He Died <S%G599><s%> Once For All <S%G2178><s%> But <S%G3739><s%> In That <S%G1161><s%> He Lives <S%G2198><s%> He Lives <S%G2198><s%> To <S%G3588><s%> God. <S%G2316><s%>

So <S%G3779><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> Ye <S%G5210><s%> Reckon <S%G3049><s%> Yourselves <S%G1438><s%> Dead <S%G3498><s%> Indeed <S%G3303><s%> To Be <S%G1511><s%> To <S%G3588><s%> Sin, <S%G266><s%> But <S%G2198><s%> Alive <S%G1161><s%> To <S%G3588><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Our <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2962><s%> Lord <S%G2257><s%>

Neither <S%G3366><s%> Be Yielding <S%G3936><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Members <S%G3196><s%> Your <S%G5216><s%> Instruments <S%G3696><s%> Of Unrighteousness <S%G93><s%> To <S%G3588><s%> Sin, <S%G266><s%> But <S%G235><s%> Yield <S%G3936><s%> Yourselves <S%G1438><s%> To <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> From Among The <S%G1537><s%> Dead <S%G3498><s%> Alive, <S%G2198><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Members <S%G3196><s%> Your <S%G5216><s%> Instruments <S%G3696><s%> Of Righteousness <S%G1343><s%> To <S%G3588><s%> God. <S%G2316><s%>

Sin <S%G266><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> You <S%G5216><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> Shall Rule Over, <S%G2961><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> Are Ye <S%G2075><s%> Under <S%G5259><s%> Law, <S%G3551><s%> ' But <S%G235><s%> Under <S%G5259><s%> Grace. <S%G5485><s%>

What <S%G5101><s%> Then? <S%G3767><s%>, Shall We Sin <S%G264><s%> Because <S%G3754><s%> We <S%G3756><s%> Are Not <S%G2070><s%> Under <S%G5259><s%> Law <S%G3551><s%> ' But <S%G235><s%> Under <S%G5259><s%> Grace? <S%G5485><s%> May <S%G3361><s%> It Not Be! <S%G1096><s%>

Know <S%G3756><s%> Ye Not <S%G1492><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> To Whom <S%G3739><s%> Ye Yield <S%G3936><s%> Yourselves <S%G1438><s%> Bondmen <S%G1401><s%> For <S%G1519><s%> Obedience, <S%G5218><s%> Bondmen <S%G1401><s%> Ye Are <S%G2075><s%> To Him Whom <S%G3739><s%> Ye Obey <S%G5219><s%> Whether <S%G2273><s%> Of Sin <S%G266><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> Death <S%G2288><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> Of Obedience <S%G5218><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> Righteousness <S%G1343><s%>

<S%G5485><s%> But Thanks Be <S%G1161><s%> To <S%G3588><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Ye Were <S%G2258><s%> Bondmen <S%G1401><s%> Of <S%G3588><s%> Sin, <S%G266><s%> But Ye Obeyed <S%G5219><s%> From <S%G1161><s%> The <S%G1537><s%> Heart <S%G2588><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> Which Ye <S%G3739><s%> Were Delivered <S%G3860><s%> A Form <S%G5179><s%> Of Teaching. <S%G1322><s%>
And Having Been <S%G1659><s%> Set Free <S%G1161><s%> From <S%G575><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Sin, <S%G266><s%> Ye Became Bondmen <S%G1402><s%> To <S%G3588><s%> Righteousness <S%G1343><s%>

Humanly <S%G442><s%> I Speak <S%G3004><s%> On Account Of <S%G1223><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Weakness <S%G769><s%> Of <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4561><s%> Your Flesh. <S%G5216><s%> As <S%G5618><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> Ye Yielded <S%G3936><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Members <S%G3196><s%> Your <S%G5216><s%> In Bondage <S%G1401><s%> To <S%G3588><s%> Uncleanness <S%G167><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> To <S%G3588><s%> Lawlessness <S%G458><s%> Unto <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Lawlessness <S%G458><s%> So <S%G3779><s%> Now <S%G3568><s%> Yield <S%G3936><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Members <S%G3196><s%> Your <S%G5216><s%> In Bondage <S%G1401><s%> To <S%G3588><s%> Righteousness <S%G1343><s%> Unto <S%G1519><s%> Sanctification. <S%G38><s%>

When <S%G3753><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> Bondmen <S%G1401><s%> Ye Were <S%G2258><s%> Of <S%G3588><s%> Sin, <S%G266><s%> Free <S%G1658><s%> Ye Were <S%G2258><s%> As <S%G3588><s%> To Righteousness. <S%G1343><s%>

What <S%G5101><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> Fruit <S%G2590><s%> Had Ye <S%G2192><s%> Then, <S%G5119><s%> ' In The <S%G1909><s%> Things Of Which <S%G3739><s%> Now <S%G3568><s%> Ye Are Ashamed? <S%G1870><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> End <S%G5056><s%> Of Those Things Is <S%G1565><s%> Death. <S%G2288><s%>

But <S%G3570><s%> Now <S%G1161><s%> Having Been <S%G1659><s%> Set Free <S%G575><s%> From <S%G3588><s%> Sin, <S%G266><s%> <S%G1402><s%> And Having Become Bondmen <S%G1161><s%> To <S%G3588><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> Ye Have <S%G2192><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Fruit <S%G2590><s%> Your <S%G5216><s%> Unto <S%G1519><s%> Sanctification, <S%G38><s%> And <S%G3588><s%> The <S%G1161><s%> End <S%G5056><s%> Life <S%G2222><s%> Eternal. <S%G166><s%>

The <S%G3588><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> Wages <S%G3800><s%> Of <S%G3588><s%> Sin <S%G266><s%> Is Death <S%G2288><s%> But <S%G3588><s%> The <S%G1161><s%> Free Gift <S%G5486><s%> Of <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> Life <S%G2222><s%> Eternal <S%G166><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Lord. <S%G2962><s%> Our <S%G2257><s%>
